plot: For the end is near. Ex-preacher Devon Blue now police detective faces the choice of living by the law of man...or the law of God.
title: Revelation Blue: The Living Waters
plot_es: For the end is near. Ex-preacher Devon Blue now police detective faces the choice of living by the law of man...or the law of God.
plot_en: For the end is near. Ex-preacher Devon Blue now police detective faces the choice of living by the law of man...or the law of God.
